bibl.title: Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1992-1993 and 1993-1994 Field Seasons. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 8.)
bibl.note: 1 front. coul., tabl., figg., cartes, plans.
15 articles. - Voir pp. 27-100: The Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab (ancient Kellis): Settlement and Cemeteries; - 101-103: Bibliography.
HOPE C.A. and A.J. MILLS (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1992-1993 and 1993-1994 Field Seasons. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 8.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 1999, 4°, vii-103 pp., 1 front. coul., tabl., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 1-900188-95-3. £20.
